Catppuccin Continuous Color Scales

Source: R/scales.R
scale_color_catppuccin_c.Rd

Continuous color and fill scales that interpolate between Catppuccin colors. Creates smooth gradients suitable for numeric data.

Usage

scale_color_catppuccin_c(
  flavor = getOption("ggcatppuccin.flavor", "mocha"),
  ...
)

scale_fill_catppuccin_c(
  flavor = getOption("ggcatppuccin.flavor", "mocha"),
  ...
)

Arguments

flavor

The flavor of Catppuccin to use ("mocha", "latte", "frappe", "macchiato", "mocha_cb", "latte_cb", "frappe_cb", "macchiato_cb"). Defaults to the value set by set_catppuccin_flavor(), or "mocha" if not set.

...

Additional arguments passed to ggplot2::scale_color_gradient() or ggplot2::scale_fill_gradient().

Value

A ggplot2 continuous scale object.

Examples

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(faithfuld, aes(waiting, eruptions, fill = density)) +
  geom_tile() +
  scale_fill_catppuccin_c("mocha") +
  theme_catppuccin("mocha")
